definitions.definition: Either of the two parallels of latitude 23°26′ north and south of the equator ; the farthest points at which the sun can be directly overhead ; the boundaries of the torrid zone or tropics .

main_definition: ( geography ) Either of the two parallels of latitude 23°26′ north and south of the equator ; the farthest points at which the sun can be directly overhead ; the boundaries of the torrid zone or tropics .
